title: Managerial Competency Development Course for Promoting Informal Learning in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Management Experience and Possession of Leadership Knowledge
context.additional_context: Informal workplace learning strategies for language-related job functions targeting corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three informal learning opportunities utilizing various workplace communication activities (meetings, mentoring, etc.) within four weeks
Learners can establish two or more communication channels to facilitate knowledge sharing among team members by applying strategies acquired through mobile learning modules.
Upon course completion, learners can implement practical plans for designating role models and deploying learning facilitators to promote informal learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
